comments.author: thomasrayner
comments.body: I wish this action also updated the dev container to help avoid issues like #12884.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @thomasrayner PR # https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/13128 should fix the issue of auto updating the devcontainer. It will be updated the next time SDK updates.
